item.title: Kia Ora Aotearoa
item.description: “Kia Ora Aotearoa!” Kia Ora means Hello in Māori, and Aotearoa means Long White Cloud, which is the Māori name for New Zealand. How it all came to pass Tanja got a work offer that allowed us to move to New Zealand.
